sourcesContent:
MCQ Quiz Result

1. What is the capital of France?

  • A. Paris
  • B. Berlin
  • C. Madrid
  • D. London

Your Answer: A. Paris

2. Which planet is known as the Red Planet?

  • A. Mars
  • B. Venus
  • C. Jupiter
  • D. Mercury

Your Answer: B. Venus

3. What is the largest mammal?

  • A. Elephant
  • B. Blue Whale
  • C. Giraffe
  • D. Lion

Your Answer: B. Blue Whale
